title: Major General Hathurusinghe and Ambassador Kongahage at the 2nd International Symposium on CBRN
content: Major General M.Hathurusinghe, Commander Security Forces Jaffna, Sri Lanka Army and H.E the Ambassador Sarrath Kongahage participated at the 2nd International Symposium on protection against the effect of chemical, biological, radiological and nuclear hazards (CBRN) in Berlin from 22nd to 24th October 2012….
